name: Bank of America® Unlimited Cash Rewards credit card for Students
freak_verdict: 9/10. This is arguably the strongest flat-rate card for students. The 2% first-year boost is excellent, and the $200 sign-up bonus is unusually high for a student-tier card. While you need 'Good' credit to qualify, the potential for up to 2.62% cash back through Preferred Rewards makes it a card you can keep long after graduation.
